quote: My husband and I got married at Mon Reve over the weekend and it was incredible, despite the hectic planning.
author: Kate Watson

quote: Every January our company hosts a Banquet for our employees. We have used Mon Reve for the past 2 years. Why? The service is excellent
author: Peter Pierre-Louis

quote: Mon Reve really is the premier event space in New York. They are a great venue: clean, gorgeous, elegant and very workable for a lot of different kinds of events.
author: Kate Winter
